title: "proceeds benefiting" italic serif
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080706174425im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/NOF_Proceeds_3295_rect_out_6328.gif)
  
And to my surprise, ’benefiting’ is a word.

author: David Sudweeks
